Uses of Package
net.jini.core.discovery

Packages that use net.jini.core.discovery
com.sun.jini.outrigger This is an implementation of a JavaSpaces(TM) technology-enabled service.  
net.jini.admin These interfaces provide common ways to export particular administrative functionality.  
net.jini.core.lookup These are the lookup service interfaces and classes.  
net.jini.discovery These are utility classes and interfaces that conform to the discovery and join protocol defined in the Jini(TM) Discovery and Join Specification. 
 

Classes in net.jini.core.discovery used by com.sun.jini.outrigger
LookupLocator
          A utility class that performs unicast discovery, using version 1 of the unicast discovery protocol.
 

Classes in net.jini.core.discovery used by net.jini.admin
LookupLocator
          A utility class that performs unicast discovery, using version 1 of the unicast discovery protocol.
 

Classes in net.jini.core.discovery used by net.jini.core.lookup
LookupLocator
          A utility class that performs unicast discovery, using version 1 of the unicast discovery protocol.
 

Classes in net.jini.core.discovery used by net.jini.discovery
LookupLocator
          A utility class that performs unicast discovery, using version 1 of the unicast discovery protocol.
